title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A responsive personal portfolio website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features dynamic project loading, dark mode toggle, and GitHub API integration.

title: Data Visualization Dashboard
description: Interactive dashboard for analyzing sales data using D3.js. Includes multiple chart types, filtering capabilities, and real-time data updates.

title: Machine Learning Model for Stock Prediction
description: Built a neural network model using TensorFlow to predict stock prices. Achieved 85% accuracy on test data with feature engineering and hyperparameter tuning.

title: Web Scraping and Data Analysis
description: Scraped e-commerce websites to analyze pricing trends. Used Python with BeautifulSoup and pandas for data collection and analysis.

title: Database Design for Library Management
description: Designed and implemented a relational database system for library management using MySQL. Includes user authentication, book tracking, and reporting features.

title: Statistical Analysis of Climate Data
description: Analyzed 20 years of climate data using R and Python. Performed regression analysis, time series forecasting, and created comprehensive visualizations.

title: Mobile App for Expense Tracking
description: Developed a cross-platform mobile app using React Native for personal expense tracking. Features include budget planning, category analysis, and data export.

title: Natural Language Processing for Sentiment Analysis
description: Built a sentiment analysis model using NLTK and scikit-learn to classify customer reviews. Processed over 10,000 reviews with 92% accuracy.

title: Computer Vision for Object Detection
description: Implemented YOLO algorithm for real-time object detection in video streams. Optimized model for mobile deployment with TensorFlow Lite.

title: Data Pipeline for ETL Processing
description: Created an automated data pipeline using Apache Airflow for processing large datasets. Includes data validation, transformation, and loading into data warehouse.

title: Interactive Data Visualization with Tableau
description: Developed comprehensive business intelligence dashboards for retail analytics. Created interactive visualizations for sales performance, customer segmentation, and trend analysis.

title: Python Web Application with Flask
description: Built a full-stack web application for task management using Flask, SQLAlchemy, and Bootstrap. Features user authentication, CRUD operations, and responsive design.

title: Data Mining Project on Social Media
description: Analyzed social media data to identify trending topics and user engagement patterns. Used clustering algorithms and network analysis techniques.

title: Time Series Forecasting for Energy Consumption
description: Developed forecasting models for energy consumption prediction using ARIMA and LSTM. Achieved 15% improvement in prediction accuracy compared to baseline models.

title: A/B Testing Framework for E-commerce
description: Designed and implemented A/B testing framework for e-commerce website optimization. Increased conversion rates by 23% through systematic testing and analysis.
